response.answer_text: The definition of ‘insanity’ as relative to the individual as an subjective term within ones experiences, does not exist. Insanity is a label hung on individual beliefs and actions based strictly on the medical/psychiatric model vs the person’s experiences—mental and emotional pain that is manifesting as the behavior the person exhibits. More accurately the person’s behavior and actions are a strategy to prevent mental and emotional imploding. People who feel helpless and/or hopeless –introvert/low self-esteem are more prone to mental implosion. More and quick emotional investment, attachment and expectations are characteristics of sensitive people. To prevent mental implosion people will revert to explosion—many different varieties. Depending on society, community or socioeconomic status the person might simply be labeled with ‘insanity.’ Addressing the core mental and emotional wounds to assist the person to develop a construct of empowered and self-enhancing beliefs, thoughts and feelings is key to create mental and emotional health. Mental and emotional health is a state of well-being, peace of mind, a state in which the person realizes his or her own potential, feels empowered and has peace of mind to work though life’s vicissitudes—i.e. the indigenous stresses of life, able to work productively and fruitfully, and is able to make a contribution to the community. Mental and emotional health is not merely the absence of infirmity. For those who struggle with maintaining Mental and Emotional well-being can create the attributes of health vis-a-vis a mental and emotional Deep Healing process. A Deep Healing process is a clear, concise and direct method of transforming the mental, emotional and physical symptoms that transcends traditional protocols while retaining a professional focus. Deep Healing avoids prescription and OTC drugs, body parts removed, artificial hypnotic inductions and psychic interventions. The process ties in directly with the experiences and needs of the person. The process is down-to-earth, to-the-point, practical, fearless and with 30+ years experience and centuries of holistic health care protocol success I know there is no doubt Deep Healing is effective.  I am here only to be truly helpful. If you have questions contact me for a 20-minute FREE no obligation conversation.

Insanity is a label based on individual beliefs and actions and based strictly on the environmental and social norms of a given society and not inherent within the person in any way. Placing said individual in another environment more accepting of their behavior and beliefs makes the definition meaningless as a descriptive term. This would apply to viewpoints both outside the society the individual is in, and from within a person’s own experience.  Due to the relativity of its definition, "insanity" as an objective term within one’s own experience, does not exist.
